verses.roman:
aiche citra-līlā kare śacīra nandana
yei dekhe, śune, tāṅra vismaya haya mana

synonyms: aiche—in this way; citra-līlā—varieties of pastimes; kare—performs; śacīra nandana—the son of mother Śacī; yei dekhe—anyone who sees; śune—hears; tāṅra—his; vismaya—astonished; haya—becomes; mana—mind.
translation: In this way, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu performed His various pastimes. Whoever sees them or hears of them becomes truly astonished.
